title: Hard Knocks Detroit Lions: Episode 5 Recap
itunes:title: Hard Knocks Detroit Lions: Episode 5 Recap
description:
On the NFL's Official Hard Knocks Podcast, Dan Hanzus and Colleen Wolfe recap the season finale of Hard Knocks: Training Camp with the Detroit Lions. Dan and Colleen start by discussing cut-down day as a number of players were let go by the Lions. Then, the hosts react to Eminem's appearance at Lions training camp (11:04). After the break, the hosts share the Liev Schreiber Quote of the Week (19:05). Finally, Dan and Colleen place their top three votes for Episode 5 MVP (22:27) to declare the season's MVP winners. We wrap up the series with a surprise imported from the city of Detroit (40:32).

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
